InstructionData.Title: Printer Primary_Secondary
InstructionData.Description: Copies the recipe, On status and Open status from a Primary printer to all Secondary printersâ€‹
InstructionData.Author: MrDrummer25
InstructionData.Instructions: alias dMasterMachine d0 define noSlaves 2 start: yield l r0 dMasterMachine RecipeHash l r1 dMasterMachine Open l r2 dMasterMachine On move r15 1 loop: s dr15 RecipeHash r0 s dr15 Open r1 s dr15 On r2 beq r15 noSlaves start add r15 r15 1 j loop
